about_the_game:
Welcome to Wasteland Rangers, a first-person shooter that combines fast-paced action, tactical elements and fun gameplay. Immerse yourself in a world of destruction, where every fight is a challenge and every battle is a step towards dominating the wasteland. The game offers 8 unique modes. There are 4 character classes available in the game: Sniper, Stormtrooper, Engineer and Medic, each with unique abilities and play style. Use weapons, modifications and tactical skills to outclass your opponents in online battles. With fun and dynamic gameplay, every game is a new experience!

Game Features:

- Dynamic gameplay: Destructible environments, fast paced and constant tension.

- 8 Game Modes: Classic and unique online modes for every play style.

- 4 Character Classes: Sniper, Stormtrooper, Engineer and Medic - choose your play style.

- Post-apocalyptic atmosphere:** Fight for survival in a world plagued by chaos.

- Online play: Battle with friends or other players around the world.

name: Wasteland Rangers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Wasteland Rangers is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you fight for survival in post-apocalyptic wastelands. Choose from four unique classes, battle across diverse locations, and prove you're the best ranger!
